directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Combine bread crumbs, Italian seasoning and garlic powder in shallow dish. Dip chicken in egg, then crumb mixture; turn to coat.
Arrange the chicken in a 13 x 9-inch baking dish. Bake 20 minutes.
Pour sauce over chicken; top with cheese. Bake an additional 10 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked.
ingredients: 6 (5 ounce) boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
1 (24 ounce) jar Ragu® Old World Style® Traditional Sauce
title: Ragu Chicken Parmesan
